verses.verse: Behold, <S%H4428><s%> a king shall reign <S%H4427><s%> in righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and princes <S%H8269><s%> shall rule <S%H8323><s%> in justice. <S%H4941><s%>

A man <S%H376><s%> shall be as a hiding place <S%H4224><s%> from the wind, <S%H7307><s%> and a covert <S%H5643><s%> from the storm, <S%H2230><s%> as streams <S%H6388><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> in a dry place, <S%H6724><s%> as the shade <S%H6738><s%> of a large <S%H3515><s%> rock <S%H5553><s%> in a weary <S%H5889><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of those who see <S%H7200><s%> will not be dim, <S%H8159><s%> and the ears <S%H241><s%> of those who hear <S%H8085><s%> will listen. <S%H7181><s%>

The heart <S%H3824><s%> of the rash <S%H4116><s%> will understand <S%H995><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the stammerers <S%H5926><s%> will be ready <S%H4116><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> plainly. <S%H6703><s%>
The fool <S%H5036><s%> will no longer be called <S%H7121><s%> noble, <S%H5081><s%> nor the scoundrel <S%H3596><s%> be <S%H559><s%> highly respected. <S%H7771><s%>

For the fool <S%H5036><s%> will speak <S%H1696><s%> folly, <S%H5039><s%> and his heart <S%H3820><s%> will work <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H205><s%> to practice <S%H6213><s%> profanity, <S%H2612><s%> and to utter <S%H1696><s%> error <S%H8442><s%> against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> To make empty <S%H7324><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the hungry, <S%H7457><s%> and to cause the drink <S%H4945><s%> of the thirsty <S%H6771><s%> to fail. <S%H2637><s%>

The ways <S%H3627><s%> of the scoundrel <S%H3596><s%> are evil. <S%H7451><s%> He devises <S%H3289><s%> wicked devices <S%H2154><s%> to destroy <S%H2254><s%> the humble <S%H6041><s%> with lying <S%H8267><s%> words, <S%H561><s%> even when the needy <S%H34><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> right. <S%H4941><s%>
But the noble <S%H5081><s%> devises <S%H3289><s%> noble <S%H5081><s%> things; <S%H5081><s%> and he will continue in noble things. <S%H5081><s%>

Rise up, <S%H6965><s%> you women <S%H802><s%> who are at ease! <S%H7600><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice! <S%H6963><s%> You careless <S%H982><s%> daughters, <S%H1323><s%> give ear <S%H238><s%> to my speech! <S%H565><s%>

For days <S%H3117><s%> beyond a year <S%H8141><s%> you will be troubled, <S%H7264><s%> you careless women; <S%H982><s%> for the vintage <S%H1210><s%> shall fail. <S%H3615><s%> The harvest <S%H625><s%> won't <S%H935><s%> come.

Tremble, <S%H2729><s%> you women who are at ease! <S%H7600><s%> Be troubled, <S%H7264><s%> you careless ones! <S%H982><s%> Strip <S%H6584><s%> yourselves, <S%H6209><s%> make yourselves naked, and put <S%H2290><s%> sackcloth on your waist. <S%H2504><s%>
Beat <S%H5594><s%> your breasts <S%H7699><s%> for the pleasant <S%H2531><s%> fields, <S%H7704><s%> for the fruitful <S%H6509><s%> vine. <S%H1612><s%>

Thorns <S%H6975><s%> and briars <S%H8068><s%> will come up <S%H5927><s%> on my people <S%H5971><s%>'s land; <S%H127><s%> yes, <S%H1004><s%> on all the houses of joy <S%H4885><s%> in the joyous <S%H5947><s%> city. <S%H7151><s%>

For the palace <S%H759><s%> will be forsaken. <S%H5203><s%> The populous <S%H1995><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> will be deserted. <S%H5800><s%> The hill <S%H6076><s%> and the watchtower <S%H975><s%> will be for dens <S%H4631><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> a delight <S%H4885><s%> for wild donkeys, <S%H6501><s%> a pasture <S%H4829><s%> of flocks; <S%H5739><s%>

Until the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> is poured <S%H6168><s%> on us from on high, <S%H4791><s%> and the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> becomes a fruitful field, <S%H3759><s%> and the fruitful field <S%H3759><s%> is considered <S%H2803><s%> a forest. <S%H3293><s%>
Then justice <S%H4941><s%> will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> will remain <S%H3427><s%> in the fruitful field. <S%H3759><s%>

The work <S%H4639><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> will be peace; <S%H7965><s%> and the effect <S%H5656><s%> of righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> quietness <S%H8252><s%> and confidence <S%H983><s%> <S%H99999><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

My people <S%H5971><s%> will live <S%H3427><s%> in a peaceful <S%H7965><s%> habitation, <S%H5116><s%> in safe <S%H4009><s%> dwellings, <S%H4908><s%> and in quiet <S%H7600><s%> resting places. <S%H4496><s%>
Though hail <S%H1258><s%> flattens <S%H3381><s%> the forest, <S%H3293><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> is leveled <S%H8213><s%> completely. <S%H8218><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are you who sow <S%H2232><s%> beside all waters, <S%H4325><s%> who send out <S%H7971><s%> the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the ox <S%H7794><s%> and the donkey. <S%H2543><s%>
